edits.corrected_text: and, telling him not to be uneasy on her behalf, for she was quite well; but he had not seen her, for what, in their intercourse, was a long time.
edits.original_text: and, telling him not to be uneasy on her behalf, for she was quite well; but he had not seen her, for what, in their intercourse, was a long time.

edits.corrected_text: “Why, bless my heart alive!” cried Clennam, in amazement. “What do you mean?”
edits.original_text: “Why, bless my heart alive!” cried Clennam in amazement. “What do you mean?”

edits.corrected_text: “Wouldn’t count five-and-twenty, sir; couldn’t be got to do it; stopped at eight, and took herself off.”
edits.original_text: “Wouldn’t count five-and-twenty, sir; couldn’t be got to do it; stopped at eight, and took herself off.”

edits.corrected_text: “Never to come back,” said Mr. Meagles, shaking his head. “You don’t know that girl’s passionate and proud character. A team of horses couldn’t draw her back now; the bolts and bars of the old Bastille couldn’t keep her.”
edits.original_text: “Never to come back,” said Mr. Meagles, shaking his head. “You don’t know that girl’s passionate and proud character. A team of horses couldn’t draw her back now; the bolts and bars of the old Bastille couldn’t keep her.”
